briefTitle: Comparison of Telavancin and Vancomycin for Complicated Skin and Skin Structure Infections With a Focus on Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus Aureus

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinical Response
outcomeMeasures.description: The Clinical Response for each patient was determined by the investigator by assessing the patient's clinical signs \& symptoms compared with the Baseline evaluation. Cure: resolution of signs and symptoms associated with the skin infection present at study admission such that no further antibiotic therapy was necessary; Not Cured: inadequate response to study therapy; Indeterminate: unable to determine outcome.
